name: Giratina ex
author: PLANETA Yamashita

abilities.name: Broken-Space Bellow
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may take a {Psychic} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon. If you use this Ability, your turn ends.

attacks.name: Chaotic Impact
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

rule_box: ex rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent gets 2 points.
